p: In contrast, onset of SARS-CoV-2 is insidious. When asymptomatic or the early symptoms are mild, patients can move freely and transmit the virus [ 13], with an incubation period that is long and infectious [ 14, 15]. These characteristics allow for easy spread, and infection sources can be difficult to identify and isolate. In addition, the main routes of transmission are through respiratory droplets and contact [ 16], which is relatively easy to achieve [ 17].
